org.clock

Class Notifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.clock.Notifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Notifier
extends java.lang.Thread
    Notifier class is basically a poor man way of doing something which should be done using java Timer
    Author:
    Micha³
